thread.section_title: The Nadler Victoria - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Feel like a King at Buckingham Palace
thread.title_full: Feel like a King at Buckingham Palace - Review of The Nadler Victoria, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: john0379
title: Feel like a King at Buckingham Palace
text:
Angelo Caporali in personal and his team served me an unforgettable time. Always helpful and very much service oriented. Angelo was always supportive and honorable to me. His team made everything easy. I really could concentrate on my business work in London.
I stayed for a couple of weeks with a few days of interruption caused by a business trip. As a permanent guest Angelo was so friendly to offer me the service to store my belongings for that time.
Now myself living in London I already directing my guests towards Angelo and his team in The Nadlers Victoria.
All in all to have a worthy time in London I heartly recommend this hotel.
